name: GOA Tech Demo #4
description:
The WebGL fix did not work.

WASD to move the little tank

R to respawn

Left and right arrows to look left and right

Escape to close the game

Space to activate Sandevistan (only in secret ending)

Boss Controls:

Keep in mind that the entire fight is in zero gravity!

WASD - Small directional dashes

Left shift - Large forward dash

Space - Upward dash (yes, it stacks)

Q - Lock-on

Up and down arrows - Adjust look sensitivity (tap, don't hold)

Rhythm Controls:

Space - Tap note

Up and down arrows - Choose direction

ALRIGHT, HERE'S HOW THIS (EXTREMELY UNFINISHED UNTIL NEXT WEEK) GAME MODE WORKS:

You need to tap to the beat to dodge the lasers.

The little grey ones let you charge how far you want to move.

The big white ones move you by how much charge you have.

Make sense?

I hope so, because that's all your getting for this week.

Good luck!

Terrain Controls:

W to walk forward (Yes, I made the animation from scratch myself)

A and D to turn

The Goal:

Get to the heavenly glowing spot

OR

Talk to the special Yoshikage Kira (the one with the floaty thing behind him)

You choose...

(Pssst... little tip for the boss... make him dash into the... uh... wall thingies)
